scripts.compile-es5: rimraf dist && npx babel src --out-dir dist
scripts.build-nexe: npm run compile-es5 && nexe -i dist/main.js -r ./dist -r ./node_modules/playwright-chromium -o bin/app-nexe --build --verbose
scripts.build: npm run build-nexe && rimraf build && mkdirp build/dist && cp -r dist build/ && cp bin/app-nexe build/
